schema.example:
*|set session mode=scan;SELECT * FROM log
WHERE schema = 'PROCESS_START_ACTIVITY'
AND (
    proc_path LIKE '%/groups'
    OR (
        (
            proc_path LIKE '%/cat'
            OR proc_path LIKE '%/head'
            OR proc_path LIKE '%/tail'
            OR proc_path LIKE '%/more'
        )
        AND cmdline LIKE '%/etc/group%'
    )
)

schema.title: 告警名称，支持使用$$引用查询输出字段

schema.example: Check the enumeration behavior of local system groups. An attacker may attempt to find the Local Systems group and its permission settings.

*|set session mode=scan;SELECT * FROM log
WHERE schema = 'PROCESS_START_ACTIVITY'
AND (
    proc_path LIKE '%/groups'
    OR (
        (
            proc_path LIKE '%/cat'
            OR proc_path LIKE '%/head'
            OR proc_path LIKE '%/tail'
            OR proc_path LIKE '%/more'
        )
        AND cmdline LIKE '%/etc/group%'
    )
)

DetectionExpressionContent.example:
*|set session mode=scan;SELECT * FROM log
WHERE schema = 'PROCESS_START_ACTIVITY'
AND (
    proc_path LIKE '%/groups'
    OR (
        (
            proc_path LIKE '%/cat'
            OR proc_path LIKE '%/head'
            OR proc_path LIKE '%/tail'
            OR proc_path LIKE '%/more'
        )
        AND cmdline LIKE '%/etc/group%'
    )
)
